channel.title: ShitDrop [VB]
channel.description:
It's old, I am sure you can make it way shorter.
PS: getcolor is a function that uses GetPixel, I just needed to write down some info everytime getpixel was called.
[code] Public Function emptyslot(slotnum As Integer) Dim checkColor As Long Select Case slotnum Case 1 checkColor = getcolor(585, 230) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 567, 275 Wait (121) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 2 checkColor = getcolor(628, 229) If checkColor <> 3687501 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 605, 271 Wait (133) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 3 checkColor = getcolor(670, 229) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 633, 270 Wait (521) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 4 checkColor = getcolor(711, 230) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 626, 267 Wait (116) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 5 checkColor = getcolor(584, 266) If checkColor <> 3687501 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 577, 310 Wait (125) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 6 checkColor = getcolor(627, 267) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 583, 308 Wait (120) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 7 checkColor = getcolor(669, 268) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 623, 306 Wait (122) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 8 checkColor = getcolor(711, 267) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 622, 305 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 9 checkColor = getcolor(585, 305) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 575, 340 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 10 checkColor = getcolor(625, 304) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 569, 340 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 11 checkColor = getcolor(667, 303) If checkColor <> 3687501 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 621, 346 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 12 checkColor = getcolor(709, 303) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 676, 342 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 13 checkColor = getcolor(586, 334) If checkColor <> rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 628, 377 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 16 checkColor = getcolor(711, 338) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 630, 381 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 17 checkColor = getcolor(588, 369) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 568, 415 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 18 checkColor = getcolor(628, 370) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 585, 415 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 19 checkColor = getcolor(670, 371) If checkColor <> 4345174 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait 581, 428 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 23 checkColor = getcolor(669, 408) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 628, 431 Wait (118) LeftClick Wait rand(8, 15) End If Case 24 checkColor = getcolor(709, 410) If checkColor <> 3885652 Then Wait rand(359, 456) RightClick Wait rand(121, 182) SetMousePos 632, 430 Wait (118) End Function [/code]

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

it’s too long, could be shortened down alot

Read full topic

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:9591”]u shud yous 4 lupe lol

Really, it helps, I think.

Two for loops, one nested on the other, and just multiply a common length away from each other times the one for loops control statement for the x and one for the y.[/quote]
But the x and y values don’t seem to have a constant difference - a couple of arrays/collections and a single loop would work though.

Btw, congrats on your Java cup Pwnd - just noticed it yesterday

Read full topic

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

u shud yous 4 lupe lol

Really, it helps, I think.

Two for loops, one nested on the other, and just multiply a common length away from each other times the one for loops control statement for the x and one for the y.

Read full topic

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Lol no it doesn’t. I was saying you made good choice. Some people would use an if statement for that. The select statement you did made it easy and cleaner.

Read full topic

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]

@nade wrote:

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Looks pretty nice. Good thing you use a select statement. I have seen a lot of people use an if statement and like 20 else statements for things like that.

Read full topic

item.title: ShitDrop [VB]
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

It’s old, I am sure you can make it way shorter.

PS: getcolor is a function that uses GetPixel, I just needed to write down some info everytime getpixel was called.

Public Function emptyslot(slotnum As Integer)
Dim checkColor As Long
Select Case slotnum
Case 1
    checkColor = getcolor(585, 230)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 567, 275
        Wait (121)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 2
    checkColor = getcolor(628, 229)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 605, 271
        Wait (133)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 3
    checkColor = getcolor(670, 229)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 633, 270
        Wait (521)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 4
    checkColor = getcolor(711, 230)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 626, 267
        Wait (116)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 5
    checkColor = getcolor(584, 266)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 577, 310
        Wait (125)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 6
    checkColor = getcolor(627, 267)
    If checkColor <> 4345174 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 583, 308
        Wait (120)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 7
    checkColor = getcolor(669, 268)
    If checkColor <> 4345174 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 623, 306
        Wait (122)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 8
    checkColor = getcolor(711, 267)
    If checkColor <> 4345174 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 622, 305
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 9
    checkColor = getcolor(585, 305)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 575, 340
        Wait (118)

Case 10

        SetMousePos 569, 340
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 11
    checkColor = getcolor(667, 303)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 621, 346
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 12
    checkColor = getcolor(709, 303)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 676, 342
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 13
    checkColor = getcolor(586, 334)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)

Case 14

Case 15

        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 628, 377
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 16
    checkColor = getcolor(711, 338)
    If checkColor <> 4345174 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 630, 381
        Wait (118)

        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 17

Case 20

Case 21

Case 22

Case 23

    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)

        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 628, 431
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 24
    checkColor = getcolor(709, 410)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 632, 430
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 25
    checkColor = getcolor(587, 440)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 585, 428
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 26
    checkColor = getcolor(628, 443)
    If checkColor <> 3687501 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 594, 427
        Wait (118)

        Wait rand(8, 15)

Case 27
    checkColor = getcolor(664, 443)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)

        SetMousePos 646, 424
        Wait (118)

        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
Case 28
    checkColor = getcolor(707, 444)
    If checkColor <> 3885652 Then
        Wait rand(359, 456)
        RightClick
        Wait rand(121, 182)
        SetMousePos 664, 424
        Wait (118)
        LeftClick
        Wait rand(8, 15)
    End If
End Select
End Function
